mapper.insert: insert into mvc_board(write_no, title, content, image_file_name, id) values(mvc_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.update: update mvc_board set hit= hit+1 where write_no=#{writeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(id, title, content, write_group) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{write_no})
mapper.select: select * from reply where write_group = #{write_group} order by write_date desc
